wikipedia_page.main: William Frederick Albury (born 10 August 1933) was an English professional footballer. He played professionally for Portsmouth and Gillingham between 1951 and 1960, and in total made 61 appearances in the English Football League, scoring 12 goals. He later played in the Southern League for Yeovil Town and in the Hampshire League for Waterlooville.

response: *Bill Albury, footballer, was born in Portsmouth
